Description of incident: Sentara Heart Hospital notified patients of a data breach when two portable hard drives were stolen. According to authorities the theft occurred the weekend of August 14, 2015. The information on the hard drives included birthdates, names, diagnoses, types of procedures and other clinical notes. According to the clinic no Social Security numbers or addresses were on the portable drives. For those affected can call 844-322-8235 between 8 a.m. and 6 p.m. and refer to incident No. COE151471.More information: http://hamptonroads.com/2015/10/security-breach-sentara-heart-hospital
